How Do You Like Us Now? Marketing Campaign Results

In higher education, reputation can have an enormous effect on applications, enrollment and fundraising. One university conducted a marketing campaign aimed at bolstering reputation, along with market research to assess whether its standing had indeed improved. We created visuals to demonstrate that the schoolâ€™s efforts had succeeded, choosing a slope graph to demonstrate the change between two points in time.
